cwipp.MODplume¶

class cwipp.MODplume(name)¶

Child Plume class used for modelled plumes (predictive mode)

zCL¶

parameterized plume injection height [m]

Type:float
THzCL¶

ambient potential temperature at modelled zCL [K]

Type:float
iterate(self):

Applies iterative solution to parameterize plume injection height

Methods

__init__(name) Constructs the plume object with some inital attributes
classify() Classifies the plume as penetrative (True) or boundary layer (False)
explicit_solution(Gamma, ze[, biasFit]) Applies explicit solution to parameterize plume injection height
get_sounding(T0) Calculates attributes relating to vertical potential temperature profile
get_wf() Finds characteristic time (Tau) and velocity (wf) scales.
iterate([biasFit]) Applies iterative solution to parameterize plume injection height
